name: T O R O I D I R
name_original: T O R O I D I R
description: Toroidir is a small game made for Ludum Dare 47. The theme of the jam was "Stuck in a Loop". Inspired by the theme, this game features a player object that moves in a circle on its own. The player will lose health over time, so they must pickup color-matching objects to restore health and avoid opposite color pickups which damage health. The player can change their radius of orbit with shift or space.
